Report Volume Brightness Unskipped Skipped %s Default Unknown Play video Skip Skip segment Unskip segment Unskip Close Captions Audio language Sleep timer Disable Previous Play Pause Next Rotate Screen Picture-in-Picture Fast forward Disable danmaku Enable danmaku Sleep Timer Playback will stop automatically after the selected time Hours Minutes %1$d min Shows the countdown for the sleep timer Playback will stop in %s Dashboard No bookmarked playlists found Feed groups Create feed group No subscriptions found Search subscriptions subscribers Subscription New feed group Group name Icon Log Filter Reset Done Perform Search Select Service Search Type Collapse Expand No error logs Copy Email No email app available Add keyword Enter keyword Confirm No items Play Queue Thumbnail Unknown Title Repeat mode Rewind Shuffle Go to Video Detail Import Database Channel Pinned feed groups Pinned Playlists Live Add to group Subscribe Subscribed Refresh feed Comments Related Videos Add to queue Already voted SponsorBlock Sponsor Intermission/Intro Animation Endcards/Credits Interaction Reminders (Subscribe) Highlight Unpaid/Self Promotion Music: Non-Music Section Preview/Recap Filler Tangent/Jokes Pending Quick Actions SponsorBlock Categories Customize which video segments to skip, along with their color markings on the seek bar. Reset Colors All On All Off Enable Skip Mode Seek Bar Color Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shoutouts to causes/creators/websites/products they like. An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, repeating animation. This should not be used for transitions containing information or be used on music videos. Credits or when endcards appear. Not for spoken conclusions. This should not include useful content. This should not be used on music videos. When there is a short reminder to like, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should be under self promotion instead. The part of the video that most people are looking for. Similar to "Video starts at x" comments. Similar to "sponsor" except for unpaid or self promotion. This includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with. Only for use in music videos. This includes introductions or outros in music videos. Quick recap of previous episodes, or a preview of what\'s coming up later in the current video. Meant for edited together clips, not for spoken summaries. This is for tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video. Represents a new segment ready to be submitted. A More Focused Experience To deliver the best playback experience possible, we are moving away from the app\'s legacy downloader. This allows us to focus our efforts on core performance and stability.\n\nWe recommend using Seal—a trusted and powerful open-source downloader built on yt-dlp with over 22k stars on GitHub. Once installed, download requests will automatically route to it. Get Seal on F-Droid To learn more about our development philosophy, see the release notes. Seal not detected Failed to open Seal. Please share manually.
